name: Booze n' Bombs
description:
Avast ye drunken scallywag, cannon overboard! 

Play as a band of rum-loving pirates sailing the seven seas. Be careful, every minute your current cannon is knocked overboard, rerolling your active cannon. Balance power-ups and power-downs as you fight to survive. 

How long can you last in this fast-paced Pirate Bullet Hell game?

A Video Game Development Club at The University of Minnesota Project

Themes: Clumsy Pirates, Roll the Dice

        Semester: Spring 2023, Project # 1
